newsitem.title: USA: Quality Dining unit adds hot stuffed bagel.
newsitem.headline: Quality Dining unit adds hot stuffed bagel.

text.p: Bruegger's Corp, a subsidiary of Quality Dining Inc, said Monday it introduced a line of hot bagels stuffed with spinach and cheese and egg, bacon and cheese, and other ingredients.
It began sampling the product in New York, Philadelphia, Chicago, Cleveland, Denver, Detroit, Cincinnati, Indianapolis and Louisville, among other markets.

Bruegger's said it is supporting the rollout of its new line with radio and print advertising, as well as point-of-purchase materials. Advertising and POP was produced by The Richards Group in Dallas, Texas, Bruegger's agency of record.
